About Me ..

I am a Navy Veteran with extensive experience as a Restaurant Manager with over 15 years of experience in a Customer-Focused field. My managing experience has given me the opportunity and tools to lead a successful team in a high-paced and high-stress working environment.

Recent Projects

I have recently graduated from the Microsoft Software Systems Academy. It has given me, and other veterens, the chance to incorporate our lives into the I.T. field. With a great understanding in Cloud Application Development. Fundamental skills in C#, SQL, CSS, HTML, Bootstrap5, Angular and Azure.

What I'm looking for

Im interested in taking on roles that utilize my Managing experience to help lead a team that is I.T. yet customer driven.
